name: Masala Chai
title: A spiced tea blend made with black tea, milk, and aromatic spices.

name: Classic Coffee
title: Freshly brewed coffee with a rich aroma and robust flavor.

name: Cold Coffee
title: Chilled coffee blended with milk and ice, topped with whipped cream.

name: Fruit Shake
title: Smooth, creamy shake made with fresh seasonal fruits and milk.

name: Cold Drinks
title: Variety of soft drinks and sodas available like pepsi ,thumbsUp ,sprite etc.

name: Pizza (Veg)
title: Thin crust pizza topped with cheese and fresh vegetables.

name: Pizza (Non-Veg)
title: Thin crust pizza topped with cheese and a variety of meats.

name: Veg Burger
title: Grilled vegetable patty served in a soft bun with fresh lettuce, tomato, and sauces.

name: Chicken Burger
title: Grilled chicken patty served in a soft bun with fresh lettuce, tomato, and sauces.

name: Vegetable Sandwich
title: Fresh vegetables, cheese, and sauces sandwiched between slices of toasted bread.

name: Chicken Sandwich
title: Grilled chicken, vegetables, and sauces sandwiched between slices of toasted bread.

name: Veg Pakoda
title: Assorted deep-fried fritters made with vegetables, paneer and chickpea flour.

name: Chicken Pakoda
title: Assorted deep-fried fritters made with chicken, egg and chickpea flour.

name: Beguni
title: Sliced eggplant coated in a spiced chickpea batter and deep-fried.

name: Puchka
title: Crispy hollow puris filled with tangy tamarind water, potatoes, and spices.

name: Aloo Chop
title: Spiced mashed potato croquettes coated in gram flour and deep-fried.

name: Cutlet
title: Assorted deep-fried fritters made with chicken/fish/veggies.

name: Kosha Mangsho
title: A rich, slow-cooked mutton curry in a spicy, flavorful sauce.

name: Malai Curry
title: Prawns cooked in a creamy coconut milk and infused curry.

name: Shorshe Ilish
title: Hilsa fish marinated in a mustard paste and steamed .

name: Aloo Posto
title: Potatoes cooked with poppy seeds, creating a dish.

name: Khichuri
title: A comforting mix of rice, lentils, and vegetables cooked with spices and served hot.

name: Luchi
title: Fluffy, deep-fried flatbread that pairs perfectly with a variety of curries and dishes.

name: Misti Pulao
title: Aromatic rice cooked with fragrant spices and a touch of sweetness.

name: Steam Rice
title: Aromatic long grain Basmati rice cooked in plain water good with kosha.

name: Rasgulla
title: Soft, spongy cheese balls soaked in a sweet syrup.

name: Pantua
title: Soft flour balls fried and soaked in a sweet syrup.

name: Mishti Doi
title: Creamy, sweet yogurt with a hint of caramel flavor.

name: Sandesh
title: A Bengali sweet made from paneer and flavor.
